name: Spike Bomb 2 (New DEMO)
description:
Dash, throw explosives, dodge, do cool air tricks and speed through stages!

Complete misions by dashing through various locations, defeat mutant enemies, get a big score and beat everything as fast as you can.

show off your skill and get a  gold pin for mastering the stages.

Story:

After a long time since the mission of the mutant cactuses, spike bomb is sent to another region to fight off a very similar problem.

With her friend, Arpy-r, the revel mutant, and 2 new team members, a new mission starts to discover what is happening and put a stop it.

Story will be more developed and explained in the full game (the demo is more for the gameplay)

Controls:

Arrow keys:  dashing & jumping

Hold Z before a jump: short hop

X: dodge

C (on air): tricks

Spacebar: shoot

Having troubles? don't worry! just take a look through the manual to know your moves better and learn some tricks to help you out!
